items.title: Transitional Justice Law Challenge
items.content: Over 300 victims of Nepal’s past conflict to file Supreme Court petition challenging recent law revisions.

items.title: Health Alert: Chikungunya Risk
items.content: Officials warn of rising risk of chikungunya amid increasing dengue cases in Nepal.

items.title: Bus Accident in Bardaghat
items.content: One dead, 12 injured after bus loses control near Bardaghat Bazaar.

items.title: National Millet Day
items.content: Nepal celebrates its first National Millet Day, promoting production and consumption of millets.

items.title: Olympic Committee Reform
items.content: Government forms ad hoc committee to resolve issues in Nepal Olympic Committee.

items.title: Politics
items.content: Prime Minister announces major cabinet reshuffle to boost governance effectiveness.

items.title: Tech
items.content: Nepal-based AI startup secures $2 million seed funding for innovative tech solutions.

items.title: International
items.content: Nepal and India finalize new border management agreement to strengthen cooperation.

items.title: Education
items.content: SEE examination results to be officially released on August 10 this year.

items.title: Finance
items.content: Nepal Rastra Bank raises interest rates on savings deposits amid inflation concerns.

popularPlaces.title: Kathmandu Valley (including Durbar Squares, Pashupatinath, Swayambhunath)
popularPlaces.description: Historic and cultural heart of Nepal with UNESCO World Heritage sites such as Durbar Squares, Pashupatinath Temple, and Swayambhunath Stupa.

transportation.details: Local taxis available across the valley

reviews.comment: Crowded but worth it for the cultural experience.

popularPlaces.title: Pokhara (Phewa Lake, World Peace Pagoda, International Mountain Museum)
popularPlaces.description: Peaceful lake city and adventure hub, gateway to Annapurna treks with attractions like Phewa Lake and Sarangkot viewpoint.

popularPlaces.title: Lumbini
popularPlaces.description: Birthplace of Lord Buddha and a major pilgrimage site, featuring Maya Devi Temple and Ashoka Pillar.

transportation.details: Buses and private vehicles from major cities
